sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Image } from "@chakra-ui/image";
import { useColorMode } from "@chakra-ui/color-mode";
import { useMediaQuery } from "@chakra-ui/media-query";
import { Stack, Circle, Flex, Box, Text, Badge,Spacer } from "@chakra-ui/layout";
import { Button } from "@chakra-ui/button";

const ProjectCard = () => {
    const { colorMode } = useColorMode();
    const isDark = colorMode === "dark";
    const [isNotSmallerScreen] = useMediaQuery("(min-width:600px)");
    return (
        <Box  w = "350px"  rounded = "20px" overflow = "hidden" boxShadow = "sm" bg = {isDark ? 'gray.300' : 'gray.700'}>
            <Image w = "100%" src = 'https://i.ytimg.com/vi/mbCpI766eC8/hqdefault.jpg?sqp=-oaymwEcCNACELwBSFXyq4qpAw4IARUAAIhCGAFwAcABBg==&rs=AOn4CLDJQEQDifOFhnQCi089kK1xmGS7CQ' alt = "first project"
            />
            <Box p = {3} color = {isDark ? 'black' : 'white'}>
                <Stack isInline align = 'baseline'>
                    <Badge  variant='solid' variantColor='teal' rounded = 'full' px = {2}>New!</Badge>
                    <Badge variant='solid' variantColor='teal' rounded = 'full' px = {2}>App</Badge>
                    <Spacer/>
                    <Text mx={5} fontSize="sm" color = {isDark ? 'gray.600': 'gray.400'} letterSpacing = 'wide'>Android App</Text>
                </Stack>
                <Text as = 'h2' fontWeight = 'semibold' my = {2}>
                    Sanmeets: Video Calling App
                </Text>
                <Text fontWeight = 'light' fontSize="md">
                I have made a Best Video Calling App which provides all the features that another best video calling apps are providing using simple java, Firebase thats it. 
                </Text>
                <Text as = 'h3' fontSize="md" mt = {4}>
                    Technologies used...
                </Text>
                
                <Stack isInline align = 'baseline' my = { 1}>
                    <Badge  variant='solid' variantColor='teal' rounded = 'full' px = {2}>Java</Badge>
                    <Badge variant='solid' variantColor='teal' rounded = 'full' px = {2}>Android</Badge>
                    <Badge variant='solid' variantColor='teal' rounded = 'full' px = {2}>Firebase</Badge>
                    <Badge variant='solid' variantColor='teal' rounded = 'full' px = {2}>Jitsi</Badge>
                </Stack>

                <Button variant = "" size ="lg">View More!</Button>

            </Box>

                
               
        </Box>
    )
}

export default ProjectCard
